entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
